_sText:
zm_machine_of_doom

***********************************

My second map for zombie mod.

Map features:
- Big
- 64 spawns
- many hiding spots and secrets
- code locked admin room with lot of fun stuff
- secret areas locked with doors, what can be opened only with an access card
- 1 custom weapon (flamethrower, made by krassell, brush model by me)
- some custom textures by me and some by my friend
- custom deathsounds for lava and for blades (from stronghold crusader)

***********************************

you also need net_maxfilesize 31 (or higher) in your server.cfg for play on this map
